mapper.update: update answer set ahdz = #{ahdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ahd = #{ahd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aztsl = #{aztsl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aplsl = #{aplsl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ahdrq = #{ahdrq,jdbcType=DATE}, ahdwt = #{ahdwt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select aid, ahdz, ahd, aztsl, aplsl, ahdrq, ahdwt from answer
